GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article that has the chosen article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with the article_id specified

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comment requested to post, on the article id specified in the params

exampleResponse.body: My even more amazing body description
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an updated article specified by its id, with its votes value incremented by the request body

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment specified with the comment id, no response given
